basics.name: Dmitry Ivanov
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Originally from Saint-Petersburg, Russia. Earned Master degree in Computer Graphics at Baltic State Technical University. Started career as a freelance designer, founded kudago.com and performed there as a frontend engineer. After the startup established on the market, moved to Canada, Montreal, where actively contributed to open-source and took part in local startups. Developed a set of audio/visual components.

highlights: Updated webpack to the latest version

work.summary: Vectioneer is robotics company based in Netherlands, needed performant waveform renderer, 1kHz update rate.
Plotly.js is javascript graphing library that powers plotly.
highlights: Rewrite WebGL core components with regl

work.summary: Web agency specializing in web-design, advertisment and social media marketing. My responsibilities include developing and optimizing web-sites.
Development of mobile app game for tracking game score.
Amaze Escape Game and Rage Axe Throwing Academy is an enterprise running two unique venues in Montreal, they have two promo websites which required upgrading.
highlights: Optimization amazemontreal.com for google page insights (92/100)
Redesign and optimization of ragemontreal.com, same digits

work.summary: Open-source organization hosting music-related projects. I am the main contributor.
highlights: WebGL-based audio visualizers: spectrum, spectrogram, waveform

work.summary: Kudago is an agency and a web-site covering cultural events in big cities in Russia, Europe and USA, it is the biggest russian event-related website. I was responsible for the frontend and design.
highlights: Design, UX, UI and IA of kudago.com
Optimization of mobile website, getting under 20kb of javascript
Getting 100 of 100 in google page insights
Setting up development process in team
Learning multitude of frontend methodologies and stacks

work.summary: Revan was a startup making jobs in domains from banking to SEO, which later grown to kudago.com, I played role of designer and web-developer.
highlights: tm-print.ru — designing logo, redesign of web-site
Design for likemeter application in facebook.com/vk.com
keywords: should we really pay for that typeface?
we don’t have budged for a commercial software

work.summary: Web-development freelance jobs, including design mockups, UI prototyping, HTML, CSS, JS, wordpress.
highlights: voenmeh.ru faculty I site - prototyping, design, development
Experience with modx, drupal, subdreamer CMS
Setting up server-side environment: Apache, nginx, MySQL

work.summary: Ingria is a startup incubator like Y-combinator, but in Russia. My responsibilities included web-service implementation for boutiqueland.ru startup.
highlights: Setting up and administrating dev & production for boutiqueland.ru
Designing prototype of mobile site for boutiqueland.ru

work.summary: STC is a Speech Technology Center, an enterprise specialising in speech recognition technologies. The position was held in marketing department, related to web-sites and promotion pages design.
highlights: Implementation of interactive guide for SpeechPro VoiceKey, using Adobe® Flash®
Developing batch scripts in Visual Basic to handle massive Microsoft Office Excel data.
Designing GUI elements for application package “Pure Office”
Designing UI icons for mobile portal kilowap.ru
Designing UI icons for project gloricism.com
Designing layout of book “Childhood”, author Andreeva L.
Designing and maintaining web-site www.le-gran.spb.ru, JSC Masterskaya
Creating 3d model of radar device for navy simulator, JSC Sistema
Illustrating textbook of methods of hydrodynamics, BSTU Voenmeh

work.summary: Writing articles on predefined topics, defining keywords, SEO-optimization.
highlights: Massive extending of russian language thesaurus and synonims specifically
Studying basic principles of SEO-texts writing

work.summary: Clearing buildings, rust removal, land works and other construction-related works

volunteer.summary: Lidia is a professor of Marketing and Economics in Arts and Creative Industries.
Morgan Initiative on Russian Cultural Affairs is russian culture institute in future and russial speaking club now
highlights: Concept, design and developing of logotype and website
color-space component, the world's biggest javascript collection of color space conversions

volunteer.summary: Global movement of free coding young people
highlights: Fixing bugs of tip, dialog, overflow, modal and other components

volunteer.summary: Technical drawing course: basic painting, photoshop, design.

volunteer.summary: Cleaning roads, taking care of environment, technical jobs.

highlights: A method of creating wall background in Adobe® Photoshop®
An article: UX approach in product design
